remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法剖析字串表示法中所定義的格式必須是日期`format`參數。The method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in a format defined by the `format` parameter. 它也要求中的日期和時間的項目`s`所指定的順序顯示`format`。It also requires that the date and time elements in `s` appear in the order specified by `format`. 如果`s`不符合的模式`format`參數，所定義的任何變化`style`參數，方法會擲回。If `s` does not match the pattern of the `format` parameter, with any variations defined by the `style` parameter, the method throws a . 相反地，方法剖析日期的任何一種格式提供者所辨識的格式的字串表示物件。In contrast, the method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's object. 方法也允許的日期和時間的項目中`s`依任何順序出現。The method also allows the date and time elements in `s` to appear in any order. 如果`s`參數包含僅一次，而且沒有日期，目前的日期會使用，除非`style`參數包含旗標，在此情況下的預設日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used. 如果`s`參數包含的日期沒有時間、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used. `style`參數也會決定是否`s`參數可以包含前置、 內部或尾端空白字元。The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters. 如果`s`包含沒有時區資訊屬性傳回之物件是。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 此行為可以透過變更旗標，它會傳回值的屬性是，或使用和旗標，它會傳回其值屬性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 如果`s`包含時區資訊，如有必要，時間會轉換為本地時間和屬性傳回之物件設定為。If `s` contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 此行為可以透過變更旗標將國際標準時間 (UTC) 轉換為本地時間，並設定屬性。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and to set the property to . `format`參數會定義所需的模式`s`參數。The `format` parameter defines the required pattern of the `s` parameter. 它可以包含一或多個自訂格式規範，從[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表或單一標準格式規範，它會識別預先定義的模式，從[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表。It can consist of either one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table. 如果您未使用自訂格式模式中的日期或時間分隔符號，使用的文化特性而異`provider`參數和寬形式的每個自訂格式規範。If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier. 例如，如果您想要指定模式中，指定寬表單中，"HH"，而不是較窄的表單中，"H"。For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H". > [!NOTE] > 不需要的`s`符合單一格式的剖析作業成功，您可以呼叫方法並指定多個允許的格式。Rather than requiring that `s` conform to a single format for the parse operation to succeed, you can call the method and specify multiple permitted formats. 這樣更有可能成功，剖析作業。This makes the parse operation more likely to succeed. `styles`參數包含一個或多個成員列舉型別，以決定是否和位置所未定義空白字元`format`可以出現在`s`及控制精確的剖析作業行為。The `styles` parameter includes one or more members of the enumeration that determine whether and where white space not defined by `format` can appear in `s` and that control the precise behavior of the parse operation. 下表描述如何每個成員的列舉型別會影響的作業方法。The .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.DateTime ParseExact(string s, string[] formats, class System.IFormatProvider provider, valuetype System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles style) cil managed
Public Shared Function ParseExact (s As String, formats As String(), provider As IFormatProvider, style As DateTimeStyles) As DateTime
public: static DateTime ParseExact(System::String ^ s, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ formats, IFormatProvider ^ provider, System::Globalization::DateTimeStyles style);

param.span: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

span.span: An array of allowable formats of s.

A typical value to specify is .

summary.span: 使用指定的格式陣列、特定文化特性格式資訊以及樣式，將日期和時間的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 。

span.span: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its equivalent using the specified array of formats, culture-specific format information, and style.

summary.span: 字串表示的格式必須至少完全符合其中一個指定的格式，否則會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: The format of the string representation must match at least one of the specified formats exactly or an exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法剖析符合指派給任何的模式一個日期的字串表示`formats`參數。The method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter. 如果字串`s`不符合任何一種模式與任何所定義的變化`styles`參數，方法會擲回。If the string `s` does not match any one of these patterns with any of the variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a . 除了比較`s`至多個格式模式，而非單一的格式模式，這個多載的行為即會相同與方法。Aside from comparing `s` to multiple formatting patterns, rather than to a single formatting pattern, this overload behaves identically to the method. `s`參數包含要剖析的日期和時間。The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse. 如果`s`參數包含僅一次，而且沒有日期，目前的日期會使用，除非`style`參數包含旗標，在此情況下的預設日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used. 如果`s`參數包含的日期沒有時間、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used. `style`參數也會決定是否`s`參數可以包含前置、 內部或尾端空格字元而不是所允許的格式字串中的其中一個`formats`。The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters other than those permitted by one of the format strings in `formats`. 如果`s`包含沒有時區資訊屬性傳回之物件是。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 此行為可以透過變更旗標，它會傳回值的屬性是，或使用和旗標，它會傳回其值屬性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 如果`s`包含時區資訊，如有必要，時間會轉換為本地時間和屬性傳回之物件設定為。If `s` contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 此行為可以透過變更旗標不當地時間轉換成國際標準時間 (UTC)，並設定屬性。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the property to . `formats`參數包含陣列的模式，其中`s`必須完全符合，剖析作業會成功。The `formats` parameter contains an array of patterns, one of which `s` must match exactly if the parse operation is to succeed. 中的模式`formats`參數包含一個或多個自訂格式規範，從[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表或單一標準格式規範，它會識別預先定義的模式，從[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表。The patterns in the `formats` parameter consists of one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format span.span: Creates a new object that has the same number of ticks as the specified , but is designated as either local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, as indicated by the specified value.

returns.span: 新物件，這個物件的刻度數與 參數代表的物件相同，且具有 參數指定的 值。

span.span: A new object that has the same number of ticks as the object represented by the parameter and the value specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件包含的類型 欄位，指出是否將時間值根據本地時間、 國際標準時間 (UTC) 或兩者皆否，而且包含時間值的刻度欄位以 100 奈秒刻度為單位。A object consists of a Kind field that indicates whether the time value is based on local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, and a Ticks field that contains a time value measured in 100-nanosecond ticks. 方法建立新物件使用指定`kind`參數，而且原始時間值。The method creates a new object using the specified `kind` parameter and the original time value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳回值不代表相同即時時間`value`參數，以及不是時區轉換方法。The returned value does not represent the same instant in time as the `value` parameter, and is not a time zone conversion method. 相反地，它會保留所指定的時間`value`參數保持不變，與集屬性`kind`。Instead, it leaves the time specified by the `value` parameter unchanged, and sets the property to `kind`. 時區轉換的相關資訊，請參閱[之間時區間轉換時間](~/docs/standard/datetime/converting-between-time-zones.md)。For information about time zone conversions, see [Converting Times Between Time Zones](~/docs/standard/datetime/converting-between-time-zones.md). 方法收到的互通性案例中很有用物件未指定類型 欄位，但您可以判斷獨立表示刻度欄位代表本地時間或 UTC。The method is useful in interoperability scenarios where you receive a object with an unspecified Kind field, but you can determine by independent means that the Ticks field represents local time or UTC. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，示範如何屬性會影響和轉換方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. [!code-csharp[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/cs/ks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/vb/ks.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將這個執行個體減去指定的時間或持續期間。

span.span: Subtracts the specified time or duration from this instance.

span.span: The date and time value to subtract.

summary.span: 將這個執行個體減去指定的日期和時間。

span.span: Subtracts the specified date and time from this instance.

returns.span: 時間間隔，等於由此執行個體所表示的日期和時間減去由 所表示的日期和時間。

span.span: A time interval that is equal to the date and time represented by this instance minus the date and time represented by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷兩個日期之間的差異。The method determines the difference between two dates. 要減去的時間間隔，從目前的執行個體，呼叫方法。To subtract a time interval from the current instance, call the method. 要減去目前的執行個體的特定時間間隔，呼叫的方法，將該時間間隔加入至目前的日期，並提供負值做為方法引數。To subtract a particular time interval from the current instance, call the method that adds that time interval to the current date, and supply a negative value as the method argument. 例如，若要減去目前的日期的兩個月，呼叫方法-2 的值。For example, to subtract two months from the current date, call the method with a value of -2. 日期和時間的目前執行個體是早於`value`，方法會傳回物件，表示負的時間範圍。If the date and time of the current instance is earlier than `value`, the method returns a object that represents a negative time span. 也就是所有的非零屬性的值 (例如或) 是負數。That is, the value of all of its non-zero properties (such as or ) is negative. 方法不會考慮值兩個屬性值時執行減法運算。The method does not consider the value of the property of the two values when performing the subtraction. 之前減去物件，請確認物件是否代表相同的時區中的時間。Before subtracting objects, ensure that the objects represent times in the same time zone. 否則，結果會包含時區之間的差異。Otherwise, the result will include the difference between time zones. > [!NOTE] > 方法就會考慮執行減法運算時的時區之間的差異。The method does consider the difference between time zones when performing the subtraction. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法和減法運算子。The following example demonstrates the method and the subtraction operator. [!code-cpp[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/VB/class1.vb#1)]

span.span: The time interval to subtract.

summary.span: 將這個執行個體減去指定的持續期間。

span.span: Subtracts the specified duration from this instance.

returns.span: 物件，等於由此執行個體所表示的日期和時間減去由 所表示的時間間隔。

span.span: An object that is equal to the date and time represented by this instance minus the time interval represented by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回日期，這是目前的執行個體指定的時間間隔差。The method returns the date that is a specified time interval difference from the current instance. 若要判斷兩個日期之間的時間間隔，請呼叫方法。To determine the time interval between two dates, call the method. 要減去目前的執行個體的特定時間間隔，呼叫的方法，將該時間間隔加入至目前的日期，並提供負值做為方法引數。To subtract a particular time interval from the current instance, call the method that adds that time interval to the current date, and supply a negative value as the method argument. 例如，若要減去目前的日期的兩個月，呼叫方法-2 的值。For example, to subtract two months from the current date, call the method with a value of -2. 這個方法不會變更這個值。This method does not change the value of this . 相反地，它會傳回新其實此作業的結果。Instead, it returns a new whose value is the result of this operation. 一般情況下，方法會減去物件，表示正的時間範圍，並傳回之前的日期和時間的目前執行個體的值。Ordinarily, the method subtracts a object that represents a positive time span and returns a value that is earlier than the date and time of the current instance. 不過，如果物件都代表負的時間範圍內，方法會傳回晚的日期和時間的目前執行個體的值。However, if the object represents a negative time span, the method returns a value that is later than the date and time of the current instance. 方法可讓您要減去的時間，例如 （指定數字的時數） 和指定的分鐘數的多個單位所組成的時間間隔。The method allows you to subtract a time interval that consists of more than one unit of time (such as a given number of hours and a given number of minutes). 要減去的時間 （例如年、 月或日） 的單一單位從執行個體，您可以負的數字值當做參數傳遞至任何下列方法：To subtract a single unit of time (such as years, months, or days) from the instance, you can pass a negative numeric value as a parameter to any of the following methods: - 要減去特定數目的年份，從目前的日期和時間執行個體。, to subtract a specific number of years from the current date and time instance. - 要減去特定數目的月份，從目前的日期和時間執行個體。, to subtract a specific number of months from the current date and time instance. - 要減去目前的日期和時間執行個體在特定天數。, to subtract a specific number of days from the current date and time instance. - 要減去的時間會從目前的日期和時間執行個體的特定數字。, to subtract a specific number of hours from the current date and time instance. - 要減去的特定從目前的日期和時間執行個體的分鐘數。, to subtract a specific number of minutes from the current date and time instance. - 要減去特定的目前的日期和時間執行個體的秒數。, to subtract a specific number of seconds from the current date and time instance. - 要減去特定數目的目前日期和時間執行個體 （毫秒）。, to subtract a specific number of milliseconds from the current date and time instance. - 要減去為特定的目前的日期和時間執行個體的刻度數。, to subtract a specific number of ticks from the current date and time instance. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法和減法運算子。The following example demonstrates the method and the subtraction operator. [!code-cpp[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得表示這個執行個體日期和時間的刻度數目。

span.span: Gets the number of ticks that represent the date and time of this instance.

value.span: 刻度數目，表示這個執行個體的日期和時間。

span.span: The number of ticks that represent the date and time of this instance.

value.span: 值介於 和 之間。

span.span: The value is between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單一刻度表示一百個奈秒或每秒的一個 10-百萬分之一秒。A single tick represents one hundred nanoseconds or one ten-millionth of a second. 沒有刻度 10,000 毫秒或 10 百萬個的每秒的刻度。There are 10,000 ticks in a millisecond, or 10 million ticks in a second. 這個屬性的值代表 0001 年 1 月 1 日的 12:00:00 午夜以來已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數 (0: 00:00 年 1 月 1 日的 UTC 0001 西曆中)，表示。The value of this property represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00:00 midnight, January 1, 0001 (0:00:00 UTC on January 1, 0001, in the Gregorian calendar), which represents . 它不包含是能歸因於 leap 秒的刻度的數。It does not include the number of ticks that are attributable to leap seconds. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性若要顯示的第二十一世紀起已經過的刻度數以及具現化物件。The following example uses the property to display the number of ticks that have elapsed since the beginning of the twenty-first century and to instantiate a object. 物件會被用來顯示使用數個其他時間間隔的已耗用時間。The object is then used to display the elapsed time using several other time intervals. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.Ticks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Ticks/cs/Ticks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.Ticks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Ticks/vb/Ticks.vb#1)]

value.span: 時間間隔，表示從午夜以來已經過的當天部分。

span.span: A time interval that represents the fraction of the day that has elapsed since midnight.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於屬性。Unlike the property. 它會傳回值，表示日期，但沒有時間元件，屬性會傳回值，表示值的時間元件。which returns a value that represents a date without its time component, the property returns a value that represents a value's time component. 如果您想要顯示的當日時間，或擷取的一天時間的字串表示值，您可以改為呼叫的多載方法`format`參數或使用[複合格式](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) "t"或"T"標準格式字串的功能。If you want to display the time of day or retrieve the string representation of the time of day of a value, you can instead call an overload of the method that has a `format` parameter or use the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature with the "t" or "T" standard format string. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的值屬性的陣列值。The following example displays the value of the property for an array of values. 它也傳回值的相反複合格式化作業中的"t"標準格式字串所傳回的字串。It also contrasts the return value with the string returned by the "t" standard format string in a composite formatting operation. summary.span: 將目前的 物件序列化成 64 位元的二進位值，之後可以用這個值來重新建立 物件。

span.span: Serializes the current object to a 64-bit binary value that subsequently can be used to recreate the object.

returns.span: 64 位元帶正負號的整數，可以編碼 和 屬性。

span.span: A 64-bit signed integer that encodes the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將目前值轉換二進位值的物件。Use the method to convert the value of the current object to a binary value. 接著，使用二進位值和方法來重新建立原始物件。Subsequently, use the binary value and the method to recreate the original object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在某些情況下，所傳回的值方法不是與相同原始值提供給方法。In some cases, the value returned by the method is not identical to the original value supplied to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱下節中，「 本機時間調整 」。For more information, see the next section, "Local Time Adjustment". ## 本機時間調整Local Time Adjustment 本地時間、 國際標準時間調整，以當地時區，由結構其屬性具有值。A local time, which is a Coordinated Universal Time adjusted to the local time zone, is represented by a structure whose property has the value . 還原本機時值所產生的二進位表示法方法，方法可能會調整重建後的值，使不等於原始值。When restoring a local value from the binary representation that is produced by the method, the method may adjust the recreated value so that it is not equal to the original value. 在下列狀況下可能會發生這種情形：This can occur under the following conditions: - 如果本機物件由一個時區中序列化方法，然後在不同的時區，由還原序列化和方法，表示所產生的本機時間物件會自動調整第二個時區中。If a local object is serialized in one time zone by the method, and then deserialized in a different time zone by the method, the local time represented by the resulting object is automatically adjusted to the second time zone. 例如，請考慮物件，代表本地時間為下午 3。For example, consider a object that represents a local time of 3 P.M. 在美國太平洋時區中執行的應用程式太平洋時區使用方法，以將其轉換二進位值的物件。An application that is executing in the U.S. Pacific Time zone uses the method to convert that object to a binary value. 在美國太平洋時區中執行的另一個應用程式美加東部時區使用方法，將二進位值，轉換至新物件。Another application that is executing in the U.S. Eastern Time zone uses the method to convert the binary value to a new object. 新的值物件是下午 6 點，以時間為原始的下午 3 代表相同的點The value of the new object is 6 P.M., which represents the same point in time as the original 3 P.M. 值，但會以美國東部時區為準的當地時間調整。value, but is adjusted to local time in the Eastern Time zone. - 如果在本機的二進位表示法值代表本地時區系統上的時間無效是呼叫，時間會調整，以便有效。If the binary representation of a local value represents an invalid time in the local time zone of the system on which is called, the time is adjusted so that it is valid. 例如，從標準時間轉換到日光節約時間發生在美國太平洋時區太平洋時區在 2010 年 3 月 14 日到上午 2:00，時間推進到上午 3:00 的一小時For example, the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs in the U.S. Pacific Time zone on March 14, 2010, at 2:00 A.M., when the time advances by one hour, to 3:00 A.M. 這個小時間隔內會是無效的時間，也就是不存在於這個時區的時間間隔。This hour interval is an invalid time, that is, a time interval that does not exist in this time zone. 下列範例顯示時的時間之內這個範圍會轉換為二進位值的方法，然後還原成為有效的時間會調整的方法，將原始值。The following example shows that when a time that falls within this range is converted to a binary value by the method and is then restored by the method, the original value is adjusted to become a valid time. 您可以判斷是否是特定日期和時間值可能會受限於修改傳遞至方法，為此範例會說明。You can determine whether a particular date and time value may be subject to modification by passing it to the method, as the example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.FromBinary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.frombinary/cs/frombinary1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.FromBinary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.frombinary/vb/frombinary1.vb#1)] ## 版本的考量Version Considerations 以.NET Framework 2.0 版中，啟動結構包含私用的類型欄位，指出指定的時間值根據本地時間、 國際標準時間 (UTC) 或兩者皆非和私用的刻度欄位，其中包含指定的日期和時間的 100 奈秒刻度數目。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, a structure consists of a private Kind field, which indicates whether the specified time value is based on local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, and a private Ticks field, which contains the number of 100-nanosecond ticks that specify a date and time. 使用可以存取刻度欄位屬性和 [類型] 欄位可以使用存取屬性。The Ticks field can be accessed with the property and the Kind field can be accessed with the property. 在.NET Framework 2.0，如果您序列化之前物件手動而不是使用序列化介面，例如，您只需要序列化中的刻度資料結構。Prior to the .NET Framework 2.0, if you serialized a object manually instead of using a serialization interface such as , you only needed to serialize the Ticks data in the structure. 從 2.0 版開始，您也必須序列化類型的資料。Starting with version 2.0, you must also serialize the Kind data.

summary.span: 取得目前的日期。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，傳回值是其屬性會傳回。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the return value is a whose property returns . 因為它會傳回目前的日期，但目前的時間，沒有屬性是適用於只使用日期的應用程式中使用。Because it returns the current date without the current time, the property is suitable for use in applications that work with dates only. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[選擇之間 DateTime、 DateTimeOffset、 TimeSpan 和 TimeZoneInfo](~/docs/standard/datetime/choosing-between-datetime.md)。For details, see [Choosing Between DateTime, DateTimeOffset, TimeSpan, and TimeZoneInfo](~/docs/standard/datetime/choosing-between-datetime.md). 相反地，屬性會傳回目前的時間，不含目前的日期，而屬性會傳回目前的日期和目前的時間。In contrast, the property returns the current time without the current date, and the property returns both the current date and the current time. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性，以擷取目前的日期。The following example uses the property to retrieve the current date. 它也說明了如何值可以使用某些標準日期和時間格式字串格式化。It also illustrates how a value can be formatted using some of the standard date and time format strings. 請注意的第三個呼叫所產生的輸出方法使用 g 格式規範來包含時間元件，也就是零。Note that the output produced by the third call to the method uses the g format specifier to include the time component, which is zero. summary.span: 將目前 物件的值轉換成 Windows 檔案時間。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to a Windows file time.

returns.span: 以 Windows 檔案時間表示的目前 物件的值。

span.span: The value of the current object expressed as a Windows file time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 檔案時間是 64 位元值，表示 12:00，年 1 月 1 西元 1601年日午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Windows 用來記錄應用程式建立、 存取，或寫入檔案時的檔案時間。Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file. 方法會使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件是本地時間、 UTC 時間或未指定的一種會被視為本地時間的時間。The method uses the property to determine whether the current object is a local time, a UTC time, or an unspecified kind of time which is treated as a local time. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-cpp[DateTime.ToFileTime#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToFileTime/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToFileTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToFileTime/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToFileTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToFileTime/VB/class1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 產生的檔案時間會代表西元 1601 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00 之前的日期和時間。

span.span: The resulting file time would represent a date and time before 12:00 midnight January 1, 1601 C.E.
UTC.

block.para:
一般情況下，方法還原所儲存的值方法。Ordinarily, the method restores a value that was saved by the method. 不過，在下列情況下的兩個值可能與不同：However, the two values may differ under the following conditions:
- 如果序列化和還原序列化值偏高，在不同時區。If the serialization and deserialization of the value occur in different time zones. 例如，如果時間為下午 12:30 的值For example, if a value with a time of 12:30 P.M. 在美國太平洋時區美加東部時區是序列化的而且在美國太平洋時區然後還原序列化太平洋時區，下午 12:30 的原始值in the U.S. Eastern Time zone is serialized, and then deserialized in the U.S. Pacific Time zone, the original value of 12:30 P.M. 會調整為上午 9:30is adjusted to 9:30 A.M. 以反映兩個時區之間的差異。to reflect the difference between the two time zones.
- 如果序列化的值代表本地時區中無效的時間。If the value that is serialized represents an invalid time in the local time zone. 在此情況下，方法調整還原值，使其以當地時區表示有效的時間。In this case, the method adjusts the restored value so that it represents a valid time in the local time zone.
例如，從標準時間轉換到日光節約時間發生在美國太平洋時區太平洋時區在 2010 年 3 月 14 日到上午 2:00，時間推進到上午 3:00 的一小時For example, the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs in the U.S. Pacific Time zone on March 14, 2010, at 2:00 A.M., when the time advances by one hour, to 3:00 A.M. 這個小時間隔內會是無效的時間，也就是不存在於這個時區的時間間隔。This hour interval is an invalid time, that is, a time interval that does not exist in this time zone. 下列範例顯示時間的年份時的長整數值轉換此範圍方法，然後還原成為有效的時間會調整的方法，將原始值。The following example shows that when a time that falls within this range is converted to a long integer value by the method and is then restored by the method, the original value is adjusted to become a valid time. 您可以判斷是否是特定日期和時間值可能會受限於修改傳遞至方法，為此範例會說明。You can determine whether a particular date and time value may be subject to modification by passing it to the method, as the example illustrates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 檔案時間是 64 位元值，表示 12:00，年 1 月 1 西元 1601年日午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Windows 用來記錄應用程式建立、 存取，或寫入檔案時的檔案時間。Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file. 方法會使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件是本地時間、 UTC 時間或未指定的類型的時間會被視為 UTC 時間。The method uses the property to determine whether the current object is a local time, a UTC time, or an unspecified kind of time which is treated as a UTC time. 如果是當地時間，它將時間轉換成 UTC 執行成 Windows 檔案時間轉換之前。If it is a local time, it converts the time to UTC before performing the conversion to a Windows file time.

exception.span: 產生的檔案時間會代表西元 1601 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00 之前的日期和時間。

UTC.

para.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法。

span.span: For additional information, see the method.

summary.span: 將目前 物件的值轉換成本地時間。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to local time.

returns.span: 物件，其 屬性為 ，而其值為與目前 物件的值相等的本地時間；如果轉換過的值太大，而無法由 物件表示，則為 ；如果轉換過的值太小，而無法表示為 物件，則為 。

span.span: An object whose property is , and whose value is the local time equivalent to the value of the current object, or if the converted value is too large to be represented by a object, or if the converted value is too small to be represented as a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地時間等於 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時間再加上的 UTC 位移。The local time is equal to the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time plus the UTC offset. 如需詳細的 UTC 位移的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the UTC offset, see . 轉換也會考量適用於由目前時間的日光節約時間規則物件。The conversion also takes into account the daylight saving time rule that applies to the time represented by the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系統方法會轉換為本地時間 UTC 時，辨識只在目前的調整規則。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the method recognizes only the current adjustment rule when converting from UTC to local time. 如此一來，轉換為目前的調整規則生效之前的期間，可能不會正確反映 UTC 與本地時間之間的差異。As a result, conversions for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect may not accurately reflect the difference between UTC and local time. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版中，所傳回的值開始方法由屬性的目前物件。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the value returned by the method is determined by the property of the current object. 下表說明可能的結果。The following table describes the possible results. |類型Kind|結果Results| |----------|-------------| ||這個執行個體轉換為當地時間。This instance of is converted to local time.| ||不會執行轉換。No conversion is performed.| ||這個執行個體假設為 UTC 時間，會執行轉換，如同已。This instance of is assumed to be a UTC time, and the conversion is performed as if were .| > [!NOTE] > 方法轉換從 UTC 到本地時間值。The method converts a value from UTC to local time. 若要將任何指定的時區時間轉換為本地時間，使用方法。To convert the time in any designated time zone to local time, use the method. 轉換所傳回的值是其屬性一律會傳回。The value returned by the conversion is a whose property always returns . 有效的結果傳回的結果，即使重複套用至相同。Consequently, a valid result is returned even if is applied repeatedly to the same . ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 請注意，確切的輸出取決於目前的文化特性和本機系統執行所在的時區。Note that the exact output depends on the current culture and the local time zone of the system on which it is run. [!code-cpp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/VB/class1.vb#1)] 下列範例會使用方法，示範如何屬性會影響和轉換方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. [!code-csharp[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/cs/ks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/vb/ks.vb#1)]

block.para:
您可以使用方法還原本地日期和時間值，轉換成 UTC 的或方法。You can use the method to restore a local date and time value that was converted to UTC by the or method. 不過，如果原始時間代表本地時區的時間無效，它不會符合已還原的值。However, if the original time represents an invalid time in the local time zone, it will not match the restored value. 當方法將時間與 utc 之間的當地時區，它也會因此也就是有效的時間調整以當地時區。When the method converts a time from UTC to the local time zone, it also adjusts the time so that is valid in the local time zone.
例如，從標準時間轉換到日光節約時間發生在美國太平洋時區太平洋時區在 2010 年 3 月 14 日到上午 2:00，時間推進到上午 3:00 的一小時For example, the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs in the U.S. Pacific Time zone on March 14, 2010, at 2:00 A.M., when the time advances by one hour, to 3:00 A.M. 這個小時間隔內會是無效的時間，也就是不存在於這個時區的時間間隔。This hour interval is an invalid time, that is, a time interval that does not exist in this time zone. 下列範例顯示時的時間之內這個範圍會轉換成 UTC 的方法，然後還原成為有效的時間會調整的方法，將原始值。The following example shows that when a time that falls within this range is converted to UTC by the method and is then restored by the method, the original value is adjusted to become a valid time. 您可以判斷是否是特定日期和時間值可能會受限於修改傳遞至方法，為此範例會說明。You can determine whether a particular date and time value may be subject to modification by passing it to the method, as the example illustrates.
[!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToLocalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.tolocaltime/cs/tolocaltime1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToLocalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.tolocaltime/vb/tolocaltime1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將目前 物件的值轉換為其相等的完整日期 (Long Date) 字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent long date string representation.

returns.span: 字串，內含目前 物件的完整日期字串表示。

span.span: A string that contains the long date string representation of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件使用所定義的模式進行格式化與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。The value of the current object is formatted using the pattern defined by the property associated with the current thread culture. 傳回值是藉由指定"D"傳回的值相同[標準 DateTime 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與方法。The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "D" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 所傳回的字串方法會區分文化特性。The string returned by the method is culture-sensitive. 它反映出目前的文化特性所定義的模式物件。It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's object. 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的完整日期模式為"dddd，MMMMdd，yyyy";DE-DE 文化特性，它為"dddd，d。For example, for the en-US culture, the standard long date pattern is "dddd, MMMMdd, yyyy"; for the de-DE culture, it is "dddd, d. MMMMyyyy";若為 JA-JP 文化特性則是"yyyy'？ 'M'？ 'd'？ ' 」。MMMMyyyy"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "yyyy'?'M'?'d'?'". 特定電腦上特定的格式字串也可以自訂，因此不同於標準的完整日期格式字串。The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard long date format string. 如需目前的執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about the current thread culture, see the property. 多個它們產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic. 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToShortLongString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToShortLongString/cs/sls.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToShortLongString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToShortLongString/vb/sls.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件使用所定義的模式進行格式化與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。The value of the current object is formatted using the pattern defined by the property associated with the current thread culture. 傳回值是藉由指定"T"傳回的值相同[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與方法。The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "T" [standard date and time format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 所傳回的字串方法會區分文化特性。The string returned by the method is culture-sensitive. 它反映出所定義的模式屬性目前的文化特性物件。It reflects the pattern defined by the property of the current culture's object. 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的完整時間模式是 「 h:mm: ss tt";DE-DE 文化特性，則是"Hh: mm:;"若為 JA-JP 文化特性，它可以是"H:mm: ss"。For example, for the en-US culture, the standard long time pattern is "h:mm:ss tt"; for the de-DE culture, it is "HH:mm:ss"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "H:mm:ss". 特定電腦上特定的格式字串也可以自訂，讓不同於標準的完整時間格式字串。The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard long time format string. 如需目前的執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about the current thread culture, see the property. 多個它們產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic. 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. summary.span: 將這個執行個體的值轉換為相等的 OLE Automation 日期。

span.span: Converts the value of this instance to the equivalent OLE Automation date.

returns.span: 雙精確度浮點數，含有等於這個執行個體值的 OLE Automation 日期。

span.span: A double-precision floating-point number that contains an OLE Automation date equivalent to the value of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OLE Automation 日期會實作為浮點數，其不可或缺的元件之前或之後午夜，30 1899 年的日數，且其小數部分代表在除以 24 那一天的時間。An OLE Automation date is implemented as a floating-point number whose integral component is the number of days before or after midnight, 30 December 1899, and whose fractional component represents the time on that day divided by 24. 例如，午夜 31 1899 年所表示 1.0;上午 6 點 2.25; 表示 1 年 1 月 1900午夜-1.0; 表示 29 1899 年而且早上 6 點-1.25 表示 29 1899 年。For example, midnight, 31 December 1899 is represented by 1.0; 6 A.M., 1 January 1900 is represented by 2.25; midnight, 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.0; and 6 A.M., 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.25. 基底 OLE Automation 日期為午夜，30 1899 年。The base OLE Automation Date is midnight, 30 December 1899. OLE Automation 日期的下限為 1 年 1 月 0100年的午夜。The minimum OLE Automation date is midnight, 1 January 0100. 最大 OLE Automation 日期等同於、 31 年 12 月的最後一刻 9999。The maximum OLE Automation Date is the same as , the last moment of 31 December 9999. 方法會擲回如果目前的執行個體代表日期晚於及更早的版本比 0100 January1，在午夜。The method throws an if the current instance represents a date that is later than and earlier than midnight on January1, 0100. 不過，如果目前的執行個體的值為，方法會傳回 0。However, if the value of the current instance is , the method returns 0. 如需 OLE Automation 的詳細資訊，請參閱[MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: 這個執行個體的值無法表示為 OLE Automation 日期。

span.span: The value of this instance cannot be represented as an OLE Automation Date.

summary.span: 將目前 物件的值轉換為其相等的簡短日期 (Short Date) 字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent short date string representation.

returns.span: 字串，內含目前 物件的簡短日期字串表示。

span.span: A string that contains the short date string representation of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件使用所定義的模式進行格式化與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。The value of the current object is formatted using the pattern defined by the property associated with the current thread culture. 傳回值是藉由指定"d"傳回的值相同[標準 DateTime 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與方法。The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "d" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 所傳回的字串方法會區分文化特性。The string returned by the method is culture-sensitive. 它反映出目前的文化特性所定義的模式物件。It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's object. 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的簡短日期模式是"yyyy/m /";DE-DE 文化特性，它會是"dd。MM.yyyy";若為 JA-JP 文化特性，它是"yyyy/M/d"。For example, for the en-US culture, the standard short date pattern is "M/d/yyyy"; for the de-DE culture, it is "dd.MM.yyyy"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "yyyy/M/d". 特定電腦上特定的格式字串也可以自訂，因此不同於標準的簡短日期格式字串。The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard short date format string. 如需目前的執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about the current thread culture, see the property. 多個它們產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic. 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 它也會顯示呼叫方法等同於呼叫具有"d"格式參數的方法。It also shows that the result of calling the method is identical to calling the method with "d" as the format parameter. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToShortDateString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToShortDateString/cs/ToShortDateString.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToShortDateString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToShortDateString/vb/ToShortDateString.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件使用所定義的模式進行格式化與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。The value of the current object is formatted using the pattern defined by the property associated with the current thread culture. 傳回值是藉由指定"t"傳回的值相同[標準 DateTime 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與方法。The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "t" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 所傳回的字串方法會區分文化特性。The string returned by the method is culture-sensitive. 它反映出目前的文化特性所定義的模式物件。It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's object. 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的簡短時間模式是 「 h:mm tt";DE-DE 文化特性，則是"Hh: mm"。若為 JA-JP 文化特性，它是"H:mm"。For example, for the en-US culture, the standard short time pattern is "h:mm tt"; for the de-DE culture, it is "HH:mm"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "H:mm". 特定電腦上特定的格式字串也可以自訂，因此不同於標準的簡短時間格式字串。The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard short time format string. 如需目前的執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about the current thread culture, see the property. 多個它們產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic. 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. summary.span: 使用目前文化特性的格式化慣例，將目前 物件的值轉換為其相等的字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the formatting conventions of the current culture.

returns.span: 目前 物件值的字串表示。

span.span: A string representation of the value of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件的格式會使用一般的日期和時間格式規範 ('G')。The value of the current object is formatted using the general date and time format specifier ('G'). 若要設定使用特定的日期和時間格式規範的格式，請呼叫方法。To format it using a specific date and time format specifier, call the method. 若要格式化特定文化特性會使用一般的日期和時間格式規範 ('G')，呼叫方法。To format it using the general date and time format specifier ('G') for a specific culture, call the method. 若要格式化使用的特定日期和時間格式規範和特定文化特性的慣例，呼叫方法。To format it using a specific date and time format specifier and the conventions of a specific culture, call the method. 這個方法會使用衍生自目前的文化特性格式資訊。This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture. 特別是，它結合了所傳回的自訂格式字串和屬性所傳回物件`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat`屬性。In particular, it combines the custom format strings returned by the and properties of the object returned by the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat` property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 其他多載方法可讓您指定的文化特性的格式，若要使用，並定義輸出的模式值。Other overloads of the method enable you to specify the culture whose formatting to use and to define the output pattern of the value. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何的字串表示所傳回的值方法取決於目前執行緒的文化特性。The following example illustrates how the string representation of a value returned by the method depends on the thread current culture. 它 EN-US 從目前的執行緒文化特性變更為 FR-FR 為 JA-JP。It changes the current thread culture from en-US to fr-FR to ja-JP. 並在每個情況下呼叫方法來傳回日期和時間值，使用該文化特性的字串表示。and in each case calls the method to return the string representation of a date and time value using that culture. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/ToString1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/ToString1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 日期和時間超出目前文化特性使用之曆法所支援的日期範圍。

span.span: The date and time is outside the range of dates supported by the calendar used by the current culture.

block.para:
方法會傳回目前文化特性所使用的行事曆中的日期和時間的字串表示。The method returns the string representation of the date and time in the calendar used by the current culture. 如果目前的值執行個體是早於或更晚，方法會擲回。If the value of the current instance is earlier than or later than , the method throws an . 下列範例提供一個實例。The following example provides an illustration. 它會嘗試以超出範圍的日期格式類別目前的文化特性為阿拉伯文 （敘利亞） 時。It attempts to format a date that is outside the range of the class when the current culture is Arabic (Syria).
[!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.tostring.argumentoutofrangeexception/cs/datetime.tostring.argumentoutofrangeexception2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.tostring.argumentoutofrangeexception/vb/datetime.tostring.argumentoutofrangeexception2.vb#2)]

public: virtual System::String ^ ToString(IFormatProvider ^ provider);

param.name: provider
param.span: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

span.span: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

summary.span: 使用指定的特定文化特性格式資訊，將目前 物件的值轉換為其相等的字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the specified culture-specific format information.

returns.span: 目前 物件值的字串表示，如 所指定。

span.span: A string representation of value of the current object as specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件的格式會使用一般的日期和時間格式規範 ('G') 的格式化輸出使用簡短日期模式和完整時間模式。The value of the current object is formatted using the general date and time format specifier ('G'), which formats output using the short date pattern and the long time pattern. 簡短日期和完整時間模式的格式由所定義`provider`參數。The format of the short date and long time pattern is defined by the `provider` parameter. `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - A表示傳回的字串中反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性的物件。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`、會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object associated with the current culture is used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列範例會顯示日期和時間使用的字串表示代表五個不同的文化特性的物件。The following example displays the string representation of a date and time using objects that represent five different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/ToString4.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/ToString4.vb#3)]

exception.span: 日期與時間超出 使用之日曆所支援的日期範圍。

span.span: The date and time is outside the range of dates supported by the calendar used by .

block.para:
方法傳回的日期和時間的字串表示中所代表的文化特性所使用的行事曆參數。The method returns the string representation of the date and time in the calendar used by the culture represented by the parameter. 其行事曆由定義屬性。Its calendar is defined by the property. 如果目前的值執行個體是早於或更晚，方法會擲回。If the value of the current instance is earlier than or later than , the method throws an . 下列範例提供一個實例。The following example provides an illustration. 它會嘗試以超出範圍的日期格式類別。It attempts to format a date that is outside the range of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ToString (string format);
.method public hidebysig instance string ToString(string format) cil managed
Public Function ToString (format As String) As String
public: System::String ^ ToString(System::String ^ format);

param.name: format
param.span: 標準或自訂的日期和時間格式字串。

span.span: A standard or custom date and time format string.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式和目前文化特性的格式化慣例，將目前 物件的值轉換為其相等的字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format and the formatting conventions of the current culture.

returns.span: 目前 物件值的字串表示，如 所指定。

span.span: A string representation of value of the current object as specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的字串表示的日期和時間值中使用目前文化特性; 如需詳細資訊的格式設定慣例的特定格式，請參閱。The method returns the string representation of a date and time value in a specific format that uses the formatting conventions of the current culture; for more information, see . `format`參數應該包含單一格式規範字元 (請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自訂格式模式 (請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))，定義傳回之字串的格式。The `format` parameter should contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) that defines the format of the returned string. 如果`format`是`null`或是空字串，一般格式規範，而 'G'，會使用。If `format` is `null` or an empty string, the general format specifier, 'G', is used. 這個方法的一些用法包括：Some uses of this method include: - 取得字串中目前的文化特性的簡短日期和時間格式顯示日期和時間。Getting a string that displays the date and time in the current culture’s short date and time format. 若要這樣做，您可以使用"G"格式規範。To do this, you use the "G" format specifier. - 取得字串，包含只在月份和年份。Getting a string that contains only the month and year. 若要這樣做，您可以使用 「 MM/yyyy"格式字串。To do this, you use the "MM/yyyy" format string. 格式字串會使用目前文化特性之日期分隔符號。The format string uses the current culture’s date separator. - 取得字串，包含的日期和時間以特定格式。Getting a string that contains the date and time in a specific format. 例如，"MM/dd/yyyyHH:mm"格式字串的日期和時間字串的固定格式顯示這類"19 的 / 03 / / 2013年 18:06"。For example, the "MM/dd/yyyyHH:mm" format string displays the date and time string in a fixed format such as "19//03//2013 18:06". 格式字串會使用"/"做為固定的日期分隔符號，不論特定文化特性設定為何。The format string uses "/" as a fixed date separator regardless of culture-specific settings. - 取得壓縮格式的日期，可以用來序列化的日期字串。Getting a date in a condensed format that could be used for serializing a date string. 例如，"yyyyMMdd"格式字串會顯示與任何日期分隔符號後面兩位數月份和兩位數天數的四位數年份。For example, the "yyyyMMdd" format string displays a four-digit year followed by a two-digit month and a two-digit day with no date separator. 下列範例會使用這三個格式字串來使用 EN-US 和 FR-FR 文化特性的慣例，來顯示日期和時間值。The following example uses these three format strings to display a date and time value by using the conventions of the en-US and fr-FR cultures. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/tostring5.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/tostring5.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列範例使用每個標準日期和時間格式字串和選取的自訂日期和時間格式字串來顯示的字串表示值。The following example uses each of the standard date and time format strings and a selection of custom date and time format strings to display the string representation of a value. 此範例的執行緒目前文化特性是 EN-US。The thread current culture for the example is en-US. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/ToString2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/ToString2.vb#2)]

public: virtual System::String ^ ToString(System::String ^ format, IFormatProvider ^ provider);

param.name: format
param.span: 標準或自訂的日期和時間格式字串。

summary.span: 使用指定的格式和特定文化特性的格式資訊，將目前 物件的值，轉換為其相等的字串表示。

returns.span: 目前 物件值的字串表示，如 及 所指定。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `format`參數可以包含單一格式規範字元 (請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自訂格式模式 (請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))。The `format` parameter can contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)). 如果`format`是`null`或空字串 ("")，使用標準格式規範，"G"、。If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the standard format specifier, "G", is used. `provider`參數定義的模式，對應的標準格式規範，以及在符號和的日期和時間元件的名稱。The `provider` parameter defines the pattern that corresponds to the standard format specifiers, as well as the symbols and names of date and time components. `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - A表示傳回的字串中反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性的物件。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`、聯目前在使用的文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the associated with the current culture is used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列範例會使用每個標準日期時間格式字串來顯示日期和時間的四個不同的文化特性的字串表示。The following example uses each of the standard date time format strings to display the string representation of a date and time for four different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/tostring3.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/tostring3.vb#4)] 下列範例將示範不同的方式格式化值使用的非變異。The following example demonstrates different ways of formatting a value using the invariant . [!code-cpp[Classic DateTime.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic DateTime.ToString2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DateTime.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic DateTime.ToString2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DateTime.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic DateTime.ToString2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public DateTime ToUniversalTime ();
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.DateTime ToUniversalTime() cil managed
Public Function ToUniversalTime () As DateTime
public: DateTime ToUniversalTime();

summary.span: 將目前 物件的值轉換成國際標準時間 (UTC)。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

returns.span: 物件，其 屬性為 ，而其值為與目前 物件的值相等的 UTC 時間；如果轉換過的值太大，而無法由 物件表示，則為 ；如果轉換過的值太小，而無法表示為 物件，則為 。

span.span: An object whose property is , and whose value is the UTC equivalent to the value of the current object, or if the converted value is too large to be represented by a object, or if the converted value is too small to be represented by a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 國際標準時間 (UTC) 會等於的當地時間減去 UTC 時差。The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) is equal to the local time minus the UTC offset. 如需詳細的 UTC 位移的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the UTC offset, see . 轉換也會考量適用於由目前時間的日光節約時間規則物件。The conversion also takes into account the daylight saving time rule that applies to the time represented by the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系統方法會從本地時間轉換為 UTC 時，辨識只在目前的調整規則。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the method recognizes only the current adjustment rule when converting from local time to UTC. 如此一來，轉換為目前的調整規則生效之前的期間，可能不會正確反映本地時間與 UTC 之間的差異。As a result, conversions for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect may not accurately reflect the difference between local time and UTC. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版中，所傳回的值開始方法由屬性的目前物件。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the value returned by the method is determined by the property of the current object. 下表說明可能的結果。The following table describes the possible results. |類型Kind|結果Results| |----------|-------------| ||不會執行轉換。No conversion is performed.| ||目前物件轉換為 UTC。The current object is converted to UTC.| ||目前物件會被假設為本地時間、，然後執行轉換如同已。The current object is assumed to be a local time, and the conversion is performed as if were .| > [!NOTE] > 方法轉換UTC 到本地時間的值。The method converts a value from local time to UTC. 若要將時間轉換成 UTC 非當地時間區域中，使用方法。To convert the time in a non-local time zone to UTC, use the method. 若要轉換其與 UTC 相差的已知的時間，使用方法。To convert a time whose offset from UTC is known, use the method. 如果日期和時間的執行個體值是模稜兩可的時間，這個方法會假設它是標準時間。If the date and time instance value is an ambiguous time, this method assumes that it is a standard time. （模稜兩可的時間是可對應至標準時間或本地時區的日光節約時間）如果日期和時間的執行個體值是無效的時間，此方法只會減去本地時間的本地時區的 UTC 位移傳回 UTC。(An ambiguous time is one that can map either to a standard time or to a daylight saving time in the local time zone) If the date and time instance value is an invalid time, this method simply subtracts the local time from the local time zone's UTC offset to return UTC. （不正確的時間是指因為日光節約時間調整規則的應用程式不存在。）(An invalid time is one that does not exist because of the application of daylight saving time adjustment rules.) ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-cpp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/VB/class1.vb#1)] 下列範例會使用方法，示範如何屬性會影響和轉換方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. [!code-csharp[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/cs/ks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/vb/ks.vb#1)]

block.para:
方法有時用來將本地時間轉換成 UTC。The method is sometimes used to convert a local time to UTC. 然後會呼叫方法來還原原始的本機時間。The method is then called to restore the original local time. 不過，如果原始時間代表本地時區的時間無效，兩個的當地時間值不會相等。However, if the original time represents an invalid time in the local time zone, the two local time values will not be equal. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱方法。For additional information and an example, see the method.
在[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系統方法可辨識的當地時區，它只適用於所有日期，包括下層日期 （亦即，日期早於目前的調整的開始日期，則只有目前調整規則規則）。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the method recognizes only the current adjustment rule for the local time zone, which it applies to all dates, including down-level dates (that is, dates that are earlier than the starting date of the current adjustment rule). 應用程式上執行[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]需要在過去精確的本地日期和時間計算使用，必須處理這種行為方法來擷取物件對應於當地時區，並呼叫其方法。Applications running on [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] that require historically accurate local date and time calculations must work around this behavior by using the method to retrieve a object that corresponds to the local time zone and calling its method.
下列範例說明之間的差異和方法[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]美國太平洋時區中。The following example illustrates the difference between the and methods on a [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] system in the U.S. Pacific Time zone. 第一次這兩個方法呼叫會套用目前的時區調整規則 （這在 2007年進入效果） 為 2006 年的日期。The first two method calls apply the current time zone adjustment rule (which went into effect in 2007) to a date in 2006. 提供轉換到日光節約時間的第二個星期日的年 3 月; 目前的調整規則上一個規則，在 2006 中，供轉換到日光節約時間發生在 4 月的第一個星期日，已在作用中。The current adjustment rule provides for the transition to daylight saving time on the second Sunday of March; the previous rule, which was in effect in 2006, provided for the transition to daylight saving time to occur on the first Sunday of April. 在第三個方法呼叫正確地執行這個歷程記錄的日期和時間轉換。Only the third method call accurately performs this historical date and time conversion.
[!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.touniversaltime/cs/touniversaltime.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.touniversaltime/vb/touniversaltime.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很類似方法，不同處在於方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is similar to the method, except that the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 字串`s`會剖析使用在目前的格式資訊由目前執行緒文化特性隱含提供的物件。The string `s` is parsed using formatting information in the current object, which is supplied implicitly by the current thread culture. 可能的話，這個方法會嘗試將忽略無法辨認的資料，填入遺漏的月、 日和年資訊以目前的日期。This method tries to ignore unrecognized data, if possible, and fills in missing month, day, and year information with the current date. 如果`s`包含的日期和任何時間，此方法會假設時間為午夜 12:00。If `s` contains only a date and no time, this method assumes the time is 12:00 midnight. 如果`s`包括日期元件含有兩位數年份，它會轉換成目前的文化特性的現行曆法為基礎的值中之年屬性。If `s` includes a date component with a two-digit year, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the property. 前置、 內部或結尾中的空白字元`s`會被忽略。Any leading, inner, or trailing white space character in `s` is ignored. 日期和時間可以是以一組的開頭和尾端數字符號字元 （' #'，U + 0023），而且必須尾隨一或多個 NULL 字元 (U + 0000)。The date and time can be bracketed with a pair of leading and trailing NUMBER SIGN characters ('#', U+0023), and can be trailed with one or more NULL characters (U+0000). 因為方法會嘗試剖析日期字串表示法，而且使用目前的文化特性，並嘗試將特定的字串剖析跨不同的文化特性的格式化規則的時間可能會失敗或傳回不同的結果。Because the method tries to parse the string representation of a date and time using the formatting rules of the current culture, trying to parse a particular string across different cultures can either fail or return different results. 如果特定的日期和時間格式會剖析跨不同的地區設定中，使用方法或其中一個多載的方法，並提供的格式規範。If a specific date and time format will be parsed across different locales, use the method or one of the overloads of the method and provide a format specifier. 如果`s`閏年中為閏日，以現行曆法方法剖析的字串表示法`s`成功。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a leap year in the current calendar, the method parses `s` successfully. 如果`s`是在目前文化特性的現行曆法為閏日在非為閏年的字串表示，剖析作業失敗，而且方法會傳回`false`。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a non-leap year in the current culture's current calendar, the parse operation fails and the method returns `false`. 如果`s`包含沒有時區資訊`result`包含值其屬性是此方法傳回時。If `s` contains no time zone information, `result` contains a value whose property is when the method returns. 如果要剖析的字串包含時區資訊`result`包含值其屬性是此方法傳回時。If the string to be parsed contains time zone information, `result` contains a value whose property is when the method returns. ## Examples 下列範例會將傳遞的日期和時間字串數目方法。The following example passes a number of date and time strings to the method. [!code-cpp[System.DateTime.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/cpp/datetime.tryparse1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法剖析字串，包含日期、 時間和時區資訊。The method parses a string that can contain date, time, and time zone information. 類似於方法，不同處在於方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。It is similar to the method, except that the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 這個方法會嘗試忽略無法辨識的資料，以及剖析`s`完全。This method attempts to ignore unrecognized data and parse `s` completely. 如果`s`包含一次，但沒有日期，則此方法的預設值取代目前的日期或，如果`styles`包含旗標，以取代`DateTime.Date.MinValue`。If `s` contains a time but no date, the method by default substitutes the current date or, if `styles` includes the flag, it substitutes `DateTime.Date.MinValue`. 如果`s`包含日期，但沒有時間，12:00 午夜做為預設的時間。If `s` contains a date but no time, 12:00 midnight is used as the default time. 如果日期存在，但是它的年份元件只有兩位數所組成，它會轉換成中之年`provider`參數的現行曆法為基礎的值屬性。If a date is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the property. 前置、 內部或結尾中的空白字元`s`都會被忽略。Any leading, inner, or trailing white space characters in `s` are ignored. 日期和時間可以是以一組的開頭和尾端數字符號字元 （' #'，U + 0023），而且必須尾隨一或多個 NULL 字元 (U + 0000)。The date and time can be bracketed with a pair of leading and trailing NUMBER SIGN characters ('#', U+0023), and can be trailed with one or more NULL characters (U+0000). 特定日期和時間元素，以及名稱及日期和時間、 中使用符號的有效格式由定義`provider`參數，它可以是下列任一項：Specific valid formats for date and time elements, as well as the names and symbols used in dates and times, are defined by the `provider` parameter, which can be any of the following: - A物件，表示其格式設定中使用的文化特性`s`參數。A object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in the `s` parameter. 所傳回物件屬性會定義所使用的格式`s`。The object returned by the property defines the formatting used in `s`. - A物件，定義所使用的格式`s`。A object that defines the formatting used in `s`. - 自訂 實作。A custom implementation. 其方法會傳回物件，定義所使用的格式`s`。Its method returns a object that defines the formatting used in `s`. 如果 `provider` 是 `null`，則會使用目前的文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the current culture is used. 如果`s`閏年中為閏日，以現行曆法方法剖析的字串表示法`s`成功。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a leap year in the current calendar, the method parses `s` successfully. 如果`s`中的現行曆法為閏日在非為閏年的字串表示法`provider`，剖析作業會失敗，且該方法會傳回`false`。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a non-leap year in the current calendar of `provider`, the parse operation fails and the method returns `false`. `styles`參數定義的精確解譯剖析的字串和剖析作業應該如何處理它。The `styles` parameter defines the precise interpretation of the parsed string and how the parse operation should handle it. 它可以是一個或多個成員列舉型別下, 表中所述。It can be one or more members of the enumeration, as described in the following table. |DateTimeStyles 成員DateTimeStyles member|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||剖析`s`而且，如果有必要，將它轉換成 UTC。Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 如果`s`包含時區時差，或如果`s`未包含任何時區資訊但`styles`包含旗標，方法會剖析字串，呼叫轉換傳回值以 UTC並設定屬性。If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, calls to convert the returned value to UTC, and sets the property to . 如果`s`表示它代表 UTC，或如果`s`不含時區資訊但`styles`包含旗標，方法會剖析字串，不執行時區轉換針對傳回值，並設定屬性。If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned value, and sets the property to . 在其他情況下，此旗標會有任何作用。In all other cases, the flag has no effect.| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 日期和時間的項目中可以使用內部空白字元`s`。Inner white space is permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 日期和時間的項目中可以使用前置空白字元`s`。Leading white space is permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 尾端空白字元的日期和時間項目中允許`s`。Trailing white space is permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||指定`s`可能包含前置、 內部和尾端空白字元。Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces. 這是預設行為。This is the default behavior. 無法藉由提供更具限制性覆寫列舉值，例如。It cannot be overridden by supplying a more restrictive enumeration value such as .| ||指定當`s`缺少任何時區資訊，則會假設為代表當地時間。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent a local time. 除非旗標已存在，屬性傳回之值設定為。Unless the flag is present, the property of the returned value is set to .| ||指定當`s`缺少任何時區資訊，它會假設來表示 UTC。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC. 除非旗標存在，則方法會將轉換傳回值與 utc 之間的當地時間和設定其屬性。Unless the flag is present, the method converts the returned value from UTC to local time and sets its property to .| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored.| ||包含時區資訊的字串，請嘗試避免轉換的日期和時間字串的值與它屬性設定為。For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion of a date and time string to a value with its property set to . 一般來說，此類字串會藉由呼叫建立使用"o"、"r"或"u"標準格式規範的方法。Typically, such a string is created by calling the method using either the "o", "r", or "u" standard format specifiers.| 如果`s`未包含任何時區資訊，方法會傳回值其屬性是除非`styles`否則表示旗標。If `s` contains no time zone information, the method returns a value whose property is unless a `styles` flag indicates otherwise. 如果`s`時區位移的資訊，包括方法會執行任何所需的時間轉換，並傳回下列其中之一：If `s` includes time zone or time zone offset information, the method performs any necessary time conversion and returns one of the following: - A其日期和時間反映當地時間，其值屬性是。A value whose date and time reflect the local time and whose property is . - 或者，如果`styles`包含旗標，其日期和時間反映 UTC，其值屬性是。Or, if `styles` includes the flag, a value whose date and time reflect UTC and whose property is . 使用覆寫這個行為旗標。This behavior can be overridden by using the flag. ## 剖析自訂文化特性Parsing Custom Cultures 如果您剖析產生自訂的文化特性的日期和時間字串，使用方法，而非方法，以改善剖析作業會成功的機率。If you parse a date and time string generated for a custom culture, use the method instead of the method to improve the probability that the parse operation will succeed. 自訂文化特性的日期和時間字串可以很複雜且難以剖析。A custom culture date and time string can be complicated and difficult to parse. 方法會嘗試剖析字串與數個隱含剖析模式，其中可能會失敗。The method attempts to parse a string with several implicit parse patterns, all of which might fail. 相反地，方法需要您明確地指定一或多個正確剖析模式，可能會成功。In contrast, the method requires you to explicitly designate one or more exact parse patterns that are likely to succeed. 如需自訂文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about custom cultures, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例說明方法。The following example illustrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法剖析字串表示法中所定義的格式必須是日期`format`參數。The method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter. 類似於方法，不同處在於方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。It is similar to the method, except that the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`參數包含要剖析的日期和時間，而且必須在所定義的格式`format`參數。The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse and must be in a format defined by the `format` parameter. 如果日期、 時間和時區的項目會在`s`，也必須在所指定的順序出現`format`。If date, time, and time zone elements are present in `s`, they must also appear in the order specified by `format`. 如果`format`定義日期任何時間元素和剖析作業成功時，所產生的值具有午夜的時間 (00: 00:00)。If `format` defines a date with no time element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting value has a time of midnight (00:00:00). 如果`format`所定義的時間沒有任何日期項目與剖析作業成功時，所產生的預設的值具有日期`DateTime.Now.Date`，或其中含有日期`DateTime.MinValue.Date`如果`styles`包含旗標。If `format` defines a time with no date element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting value by default has a date of `DateTime.Now.Date`, or it has a date of `DateTime.MinValue.Date` if `styles` includes the flag. `style`參數會決定是否`s`參數可以包含前置、 內部或尾端空白字元。The `style` parameter determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters. 如果`s`包含沒有時區資訊屬性傳回之物件是。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 此行為可以透過變更旗標，它會傳回值的屬性是，或使用和旗標，它會傳回其值屬性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 必要時，如果 s 包含時區資訊，將時間會轉換為本機時間而屬性傳回之物件設定為。If s contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 此行為可以透過變更旗標不當地時間轉換成國際標準時間 (UTC)，並設定屬性。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the property to . `format`參數包含對應至預期的格式模式`s`參數。The `format` parameter contains a pattern that corresponds to the expected format of the `s` parameter. 中的模式`format`參數包含一個或多個自訂格式規範，從[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表或單一標準格式規範，它會識別預先定義的模式，從[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表。The pattern in the `format` parameter consists of one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table. 如果您未使用自訂格式模式中的日期或時間分隔符號，使用的文化特性而異`provider`參數和寬形式的每個自訂格式規範。If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier. 例如，如果您想要指定模式中，指定寬表單中，"HH"，而不是較窄的表單中，"H"。For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H". > [!NOTE] > 不需要的`s`符合單一格式的剖析作業成功，您可以呼叫方法並指定多個允許的格式。Rather than requiring that `s` conform to a single format for formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`、使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法剖析符合指派給任何的模式一個日期的字串表示`formats`參數。The method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter. 就像方法，除了方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。It is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`參數包含要剖析的日期和時間。The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse. 如果`s`參數包含僅一次，而且沒有日期，目前的日期會使用，除非`style`參數包含旗標，在此情況下的預設日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used. 如果`s`參數包含的日期沒有時間、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used. `style`參數也會決定是否`s`參數可以包含前置、 內部或尾端空格字元而不是所允許的格式字串中的其中一個`formats`。The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters other than those permitted by one of the format strings in `formats`. 如果`s`包含沒有時區資訊屬性傳回之物件是。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 此行為可以透過變更旗標，它會傳回值的屬性是，或使用和旗標，它會傳回其值屬性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 必要時，如果 s 包含時區資訊，將時間會轉換為本機時間而屬性傳回之物件設定為。If s contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 此行為可以透過變更旗標不當地時間轉換成國際標準時間 (UTC)，並設定屬性。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the property to . `formats`參數包含陣列的模式，其中`s`必須完全符合，剖析作業會成功。The `formats` parameter contains an array of patterns, one of which `s` must match exactly if the parse operation is to succeed. value.span: 物件，其值為目前的 UTC 日期和時間。

span.span: An object whose value is the current UTC date and time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的解析取決於系統計時器，取決於基礎作業系統。The resolution of this property depends on the system timer, which depends on the underlying operating system. 它通常會以 0.5 和 15 毫秒之間。It tends to be between 0.5 and 15 milliseconds. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，傳回值是其屬性會傳回。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the return value is a whose property returns . 除了使用是。An alternative to using is . 而前者則表示日期和時間值是國際標準時間 (UTC)，藉由指派至其屬性，後者會將指派日期和時間值的 UTC 時間的時差 (等於)。While the former indicates that a date and time value is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) by assigning to its property, the latter assigns the date and time value the UTC time's offset (equal to ). ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，示範如何屬性會影響和轉換方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. summary.span: 取得這個執行個體所表示日期的年份元件。

span.span: Gets the year component of the date represented by this instance.

value.span: 年份，在 1 和 9999 之間。

span.span: The year, between 1 and 9999.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回西曆中的目前執行個體的年份。The property returns the year of the current instance in the Gregorian calendar. 它不會傳回使用目前文化特性的預設曆法的年。It does not return the year using the default calendar of the current culture. 若要擷取使用特定的日曆年度，您可以呼叫該曆法的`GetYear`方法，如下列程式碼所示。To retrieve the year using a particular calendar, you can call that calendar's `GetYear` method, as the following code shows.
